caption:
Absolute   for Schneids this year. #Repost @davidofdaveart
 
It is rough...  it is raw...  it is matte...  it is a Time Traveller design...  We travelled back in time to create the design just like the first days of mask paint back in the 70s... So no airbrush, no FX  what so ever... just an old school brush  and the colors red , black  and white . It is painted so rough so you can clearly see the brush strokes . That is what we call a true Storyteller mask . Cory and I discussed a lot how to create his new chapter of mask art. Cory wanted a very clean look, we came up with a plan how to build the design on contrasts and colors, and I started to paint . Thanks Cory! I am so proud to be your painting wingman  #coryschneider @njdevils #DaveArt @nhl #DaveArtTheMaskNerd   #nhl #DaveArtTheCradleOfCreativity
caption_raw:
Absolute 🔥🔥🔥 for Schneids this year. #Repost @davidofdaveart
・・・
It is rough...👊🏻 it is raw...👊🏻 it is matte...👊🏻 it is a Time Traveller design...🚀 We travelled back in time to create the design just like the first days of mask paint back in the 70s... So no airbrush, no FX✨ what so ever... just an old school brush🖌 and the colors red🔴, black⚫️ and white⚪️. It is painted so rough so you can clearly see the brush strokes😊. That is what we call a true Storyteller mask📕. Cory and I discussed a lot how to create his new chapter of mask art. Cory wanted a very clean look, we came up with a plan how to build the design on contrasts and colors, and I started to paint🎨🖌. Thanks Cory! I am so proud to be your painting wingman🙏🏻🤓 #coryschneider @njdevils #DaveArt @nhl #DaveArtTheMaskNerd 🤓 #nhl #DaveArtTheCradleOfCreativity

To the @njdevils for providing us their whole rink to me, the NHL alumni that played for me, the @reevefoundation for everything they've been doing for me since day 1. @7boomeresiason @cc660 without you guys none of this would be possible thank you from the bottom of my heart.. and to everyone who came thank you for supporting me and the paralysis community.
